subject: Languages
title: Sign Language Is Not Universal
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Sign Language Is Not Universal.

hook.text: Most people assume sign language is the same worldwide. There are actually over 300 different sign languages.

buildup.text: Each sign language evolved independently within its own deaf community, with its own grammar.

discovery.text: American Sign Language is closer to French Sign Language than to British Sign Language.

punchline.text: Sign languages are as diverse as spoken ones. The hands speak many tongues.
